thread.title: UEFA 'fully supports' Michel Platini - Austrian FA head
thread.title_full: UEFA 'fully supports' Michel Platini - Austrian FA head

title: UEFA 'fully supports' Michel Platini - Austrian FA head
text:
UEFA 'fully supports' Michel Platini - Austrian FA head NYON, Switzerland UEFA President Michel Platini attends a news conference after the draw for the 2015/2016 UEFA Europa League soccer competition at Monaco's Grimaldi Forum in Monte Carlo, Monaco August 28, 2015. Reuters/Eric Gaillard - 
NYON, Switzerland European soccer body UEFA's national associations "fully support" Michel Platini, Austrian FA President Leo Windtner told reporters after a meeting of all 54 member associations on Thursday. 
Platini, who hopes to be a candidate for FIFA president in February, was suspended for 90 days by FIFA's Ethics Committee last week but is appealing the decision and denies any wrongdoing. 
(Reporting by Simon Evans , Editing by Michael Shields)
